titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay, Political Department to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a letter from John Adam, Secretary to the Government at Fort William [Calcutta], to Francis Warden, confirming that the Court of Directors will pay Jaffer Ali Khan [Jafer Ali Khan] 8,000 rupees as a reward for his services to the British Missions in Persia and requesting Bruce to pay this sum to him.
